Title: AGNC Investment Set to Report Q3 Earnings: What's in the Cards?
Summary: AGNC gears up for third-quarter results amid Fed rate cut, range-bound mortgage rates and resilient book value trends.
--------------------------------
Title: Intuit Upgrades Mailchimp to Seize Holiday Season Opportunity
Summary: INTU's upgraded Mailchimp brings smarter Shopify tools, global SMS and real-time analytics to boost retailers' holiday sales.
--------------------------------
Title: Salesforce Bets on Agentforce 360: Will it Spark the Next Growth Leg?
Summary: CRM's new Agentforce 360 integrates AI and human workflows across core business areas, fueling rapid adoption and surging AI-driven revenues.
--------------------------------
Title: Inside The Mind Of Ilya Manin: Perspectives On Leadership And Vision
Summary: In a digital world obsessed with optics, Ilya Manin remains quietly effective. He's not on every panel, he doesn't live on social media, and he's never made a show of building companies. Yet his fingerprints are on several of the most forward-thinking ventures across emerging tech, web3 ...
--------------------------------
Title: Wall Street Analysts See a 105.88% Upside in Alvotech  ( ALVO ) : Can the Stock Really Move This High?
Summary: The mean of analysts' price targets for Alvotech (ALVO) points to a 105.9% upside in the stock. While this highly sought-after metric has not proven reasonably effective, strong agreement among analysts in raising earnings estimates does indicate an upside in the stock.
--------------------------------
Title: Wall Street Analysts Predict a 33.17% Upside in Carpenter  ( CRS ) : Here's What You Should Know
Summary: The mean of analysts' price targets for Carpenter (CRS) points to a 33.2% upside in the stock. While this highly sought-after metric has not proven reasonably effective, strong agreement among analysts in raising earnings estimates does indicate an upside in the stock.
--------------------------------
Title: Brookfield Infrastructure Partners  ( BIP ) 's Technical Outlook is Bright After Key Golden Cross
Summary: Is it a good or bad thing when a stock experiences a golden cross technical event?
--------------------------------
Title: Wall Street Analysts Think Red Robin  ( RRGB )  Could Surge 61.05%: Read This Before Placing a Bet
Summary: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 61.1% in Red Robin (RRGB). While the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric is questionable, the positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.
--------------------------------
Title: Is Chevron the Smartest Investment You Can Make Today?
Summary: Chevron, facing weak energy prices, has an above-average yield, a long history of dividend increases, and a solid balance sheet.
--------------------------------
Title: Viktoriia Piesova: A Financial Strategist Who Bridges Corporate And Entrepreneurial Worlds
Summary: The modern business world moves at a relentless pace, with shifting markets and unexpected challenges testing even the most prepared companies. Financial management has become a crucial skill for businesses of all sizes.

Summary: Whether you're a value, growth, or momentum investor, finding strong stocks becomes easier with the Zacks Style Scores, a top feature of the Zacks Premium research service.
